business_context: The food delivery system is a platform that facilitates the delivery of food from restaurants and other food providers to customers.

suggested_features.name: Order Tracking
suggested_features.description: Allows customers to track their order in real-time from preparation to delivery.

suggested_features.name: Delivery Scheduling
suggested_features.description: Enables customers to schedule delivery times to fit their convenience.

suggested_features.name: Restaurant Menu Browsing
suggested_features.description: Provides detailed menu information and allows customers to view options from various restaurants.

suggested_features.name: Customer Reviews
suggested_features.description: Allows customers to leave and view reviews of restaurants and delivery services.

suggested_features.name: Order History
suggested_features.description: Maintains a record of previous orders for easy reordering and tracking.

suggested_features.name: Payment Options
suggested_features.description: Provides multiple payment methods including cash on delivery, credit/debit cards, and digital wallets.

suggested_features.name: Customer Support Chat
suggested_features.description: 24/7 chat support for customers to resolve issues and get assistance.

suggested_features.name: Delivery Drivers Information
suggested_features.description: Provides information about the delivery drivers including their current location and estimated time of arrival.

suggested_features.name: Allergen Information
suggested_features.description: Displays allergen information for dishes to help customers make informed choices.

suggested_features.name: Discounts and Promotions
suggested_features.description: Offers and highlights ongoing discounts and promotional deals.

selected_features.name: Payment Options
selected_features.description: Provides multiple payment methods including cash on delivery, credit/debit cards, and digital wallets.
